5/ And so every time we get stuck talking (again) about military aid to Ukraine, we are missing the real game Russia is playing. We should keep up security funding, but we really should be arguing over how much MORE economic and democracy assistance we should be sending to Kiev.

4/ Russia’s real goal is to economically and politically break Ukraine, leading Ukrainian voters to give up and install pro-Russian leaders again. Thus, the chief U.S. goal must be to support and protect Ukraine’s fragile democracy and economy.
3/ At the same time, for years, the Washington establishment has acted like Russia is actually going to march on Kiev (they aren’t) and that our military assistance is saving Ukraine.

2/ Putin is in the process of testing the new Ukrainian president, seeing if he can be bullied. Zelesnky has stood tall so far. But now, at this critical moment, it’s a terrible time for us to suggest we are drawing back our support for this new, western oriented leader.

Short THREAD on Ukraine: 1/ Trump’s decision to hold back security assistance is a bad idea, but once again Washington is caught in this trap of acting like the best way to help Ukraine is to load them up with more weapons.

I'm live now discussing the latest state of play on background checks legislation and my conversations with the White House. Watch here➡️  http://ct-n.com/ctnplayer.asp?livestream=3 …
HR 8 (and my bill in the Senate) is a universal background checks bill. And to be clear, if Trump got behind it, it would get 60 votes in the Senate. That is still the easiest and best path.

News reports often confuse “expanded background checks” (more of them, like at gun shows) with “universal background checks” (on every sale).

They aren’t the same thing. It might be that the White House opposes one and not the other (though 90% of voters want universal checks).

I spoke with the White House today. They have not walked away from improving background checks. I am skeptical we can reach consensus but I’m willing to stay at the table over next few weeks. Maybe I’m a fool for trying but stakes are too high.
